data.quote: How many cares one loses when one decides not to be something but to be someone.
data.author: Gabrielle Coco Chanel

data.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: Imitation is suicide.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: Do your own thing on your own terms and get what you came here for.
data.author: Oliver James

data.quote: Flatter yourself critically.
data.author: Willis Goth Regier

data.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right, for you’ll be criticized anyway.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Better to write for yourself and have no public, than to write for the public and have no self.
data.author: Cyril Connolly

data.quote: We must not allow other people’s limited perceptions to define us.
data.author: Virginia Satir

data.quote: Don’t look for society to give you permission to be yourself.
data.author: Steve Maraboli

data.quote: If things go wrong, don’t go with them.
data.author: Roger Babson

data.quote: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of who you are.
data.author: Kurt Cobain

data.quote: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
data.author: Chinese Proverb

data.quote: Where’s your will to be weird?
data.author: Jim Morrison

data.quote: Some people say you are going the wrong way, when it’s simply a way of your own.
data.author: Angelina Jolie

data.quote: Remember to always be yourself. Unless you suck.
data.author: Joss Whedon

data.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: To find yourself, think for yourself.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: If you seek authenticity for authenticity’s sake you are no longer authentic.
data.author: Jean Paul Sartre
